page.title: 11SW Hamilton - Transportation
page.content: {RAILWAY TRANSPORT} The Hamilton-Strathaven line which joined Meikle Earnock, Blantyre, etc. was closed in 1964. So the nearest railway station to our area is Hamilton Central approximately 2 miles to the north. {BUS ROUTES} The area is crossed by a number of bus routes. Four separate bus routes to Strathaven use the A723. Another leaves Meikle Earnock and goes through Hamilton to Coatbridge. A long dista- nce coach from Edinburgh to Kilmarnock also uses the A723. Two services join Eddlewood to Hamilton, then Glasgow. The other areas have local services running through them. Most people interviewed were "happy" with public transport.
